name: MindMade Technologies
description:
MindMade Technologies was founded in 2011 by business professionals who aspire to achieve excellence. We deliver reliable mobile application development services & solutions for Android & iOS devices to clients worldwide on time and on budget.
Our structured and flexible project management approach helps our clients achieve success. In pursuit of this succes, we take our clients' requirements, specifications, budget, and deadline into consideration. Our team of developers always works to find the best solution for individual clients.
